sentences.sContent: The government has decided to scrap quotas on car imports.
sentences.sCn: 政府决定取消汽车进口配额。

sentences.sContent: There are plans to introduce strict immigration quotas.
sentences.sCn: 有计划要推行严格的移民限额制度。

phrases.pCn: n. 配额制；定额分配制
生产指标；生产限额；生产配额；生产预计额
销售配额；销售限额；目标销售额

remMethod.val: “阔的” → 出手阔绰， 没有限额 → 限额

trans.tranCn: 定额， 限额， 配额
trans.tranOther: an official limit on the number or amount of something that is allowed in a particular period
